title: Deadly Straits
description: A PULSE-POUNDING PAGE-TURNER FOR FANS OF FORSYTH, LUDLUM, CUSSLER, AND VINTAGE CLANCY. A terror attack that stuns the world. A deadly plot that will forever change the balance of power. An innocent man framed for his own daughter's kidnapping. Meet Tom Dugan, a wise-cracking, globe-trotting consultant with issues.When the CIA asked Dugan to use his job as cover to 'take a few pictures,' he readily agreed, unaware his life was about to be changed forever and not in a good way.When he's set up and falsely accused of terrorism, the CIA offers him a deal, IF he betrays his best friend.With international terrorism and the weaponization of oil as a backdrop, DEADLY STRAITS is a taut thriller that focuses on the timeless questions of loyalty and love of family. What will a man do to save his only child? When is the price of loyalty to a friend too high?If you enjoy Forsyth, Ludlum, Cussler, and the original Clancy thrillers, DEADLY STRAITS will keep you turning pages late into the night. ALL THE TOM DUGAN THRILLERS ARE STANDALONE STORIES. THEY MAY BE READ IN ANY ORDER.
author: R.E. McDermott
